2025-09-07T08:04:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to hoisting of Strong Wind Signal No. 3 and the associated wet weather, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. pay attention to the special traffic and transport arrangements may be implemented; ii. pay attention to the possible traffic congestions of the roads; iii. plan the journey in advance; iv. allow more traveling time to cater for delay; v. drive with extra care and patience; and vi. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-09-07T08:04:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於三號強風信號現正生效、天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.留意當局可能會實施特別的交通及運輸措施； ii.留意在個別道路可能會出現交通擠塞的情況； iii.提早計劃行程路線； iv.預留充裕時間出門； v.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 vi.特别留意視線受阻的交通繁忙路口。

2025-09-07T21:20:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to hoisting of No. 8 Southeast Gale or Storm Signal and the associated wet weather, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. pay attention to the special traffic and transport arrangements may be implemented; ii. pay attention to the possible traffic congestions of the roads; iii. plan the journey in advance; iv. allow more traveling time to cater for delay; v. drive with extra care and patience; and vi. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-09-07T21:20:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於八號東南烈風或暴風信號現正生效、天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.留意當局可能會實施特別的交通及運輸措施； ii.留意在個別道路可能會出現交通擠塞的情況； iii.提早計劃行程路線； iv.預留充裕時間出門； v.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 vi.特别留意視線受阻的交通繁忙路口。

2025-09-08T13:10:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to hoisting of Strong Wind Signal No. 3 and the associated wet weather, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. pay attention to the special traffic and transport arrangements may be implemented; ii. pay attention to the possible traffic congestions of the roads; iii. plan the journey in advance; iv. allow more traveling time to cater for delay; v. drive with extra care and patience; and vi. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Individual train service destination change on 8 September 2025
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 2025年9月8日個別列車始發/終到站更改

2025-09-07T11:58:00.CONTENT_EN: As informed by the Mainland Railway Authorities, the destination of High Speed Rail train G6048/G6047 on 8 September 2025 travelling between Hong Kong West Kowloon Station and Zhanjiangxi Station will change to Guangzhounan Station due to adverse weather conditions. Trains affected: G6048 (will arrive at Guangzhounan Station) G6047 (will depart from Guangzhounan Station) For the latest train schedules, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn), HSR website, mobile app or the information provided at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station.
2025-09-07T11:58:00.CONTENT_CN: 內地鐵路單位通報，由於天氣情況惡劣，2025年9月8日原定來往香港西九龍站及湛江西站的高速鐵路列車車次G6048/G6047，更改為來往香港西九龍站至廣州南站。 受影響車次: G6048 (終到站更改為廣州南站) G6047 (始發站更改為廣州南站) 有關車次的資料，請留意12306官方網站(12306.cn)、高速鐵路網頁、手機應用程式或香港西九龍站發放的最新資訊。

2025-09-08T13:35:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to typhoon, the arrangements of High Speed Rail are as follows: Entrance / Exit of Hong Kong West Kowloon Station reopened Entrance / Exit C of Hong Kong West Kowloon Station is reopened. The Hong Kong Observatory has announced that The Strong Wind Signal No. 8 now issued. Before your journey, please check your train information through 12306 official website (12306. cn), mobile app or HSR website ; stay tuned for the road or traffic conditions, and allow more time to travel to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. If you purchased your ticket through the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app and would like to make changes to your journey, you may change the booking or obtain a ticket refund up to 45 minutes before the train departure time using the original purchase process. Individual train service destination change on 8 September 2025 As informed by the Mainland Railway Authorities, the destination of High Speed Rail train G6048/G6047 on 8 September 2025 travelling between Hong Kong West Kowloon Station and Zhanjiangxi Station will change to Guangzhounan Station due to adverse weather conditions. Trains affected: G6048 (will arrive at Guangzhounan Station) G6047 (will depart from Guangzhounan Station) For the latest train schedules, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn), HSR website, mobile app or the information provided at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station.
2025-09-08T13:35:00.CONTENT_CN:
受颱風影響，高速鐵路安排如下： 香港西九龍站出入口重新開放 香港西九龍站C出入口重新開放。 香港天文台公佈3號強風信號現正生效。 出發前，請在12306官方網站(12306.cn)、手機應用程式或高速鐵路網頁查閱 
有關班次的資料，留意路面或交通情況的最新公佈消息，並預留額外時間前往香港西九龍站。 乘客如果之前透過12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式購買高鐵車票，如果想更改行程，可以透過12306平台，在列車出發前45分鐘辦理更改或取消車次。 2025年9月8日個別列車始發/終到站更改 內地鐵路單位通報，由於天氣情況惡劣，2025年9月8日原定來往香港西九龍站及湛江西站的高速鐵路列車車次G6048/G6047，更改為來往香港西九龍站至廣州南站。 受影響車次: G6048 (終到站更改為廣州南站) G6047 (始發站更改為廣州南站) 有關車次的資料，請留意12306官方網站(12306.cn)、高速鐵路網頁、手機應用程式或香港西九龍站發放的最新資訊。

2025-09-08T19:32:00.CONTENT_EN: As informed by the Mainland Railway Authorities, the destination of High Speed Rail train G6048/G6047 on 8 September 2025 travelling between Hong Kong West Kowloon Station and Zhanjiangxi Station will change to Guangzhounan Station due to adverse weather conditions. Trains affected: G6048 (will arrive at Guangzhounan Station) G6047 (will depart from Guangzhounan Station) For the latest train schedules, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn), HSR website, mobile app or the information provided at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station.
2025-09-08T19:32:00.CONTENT_CN: 內地鐵路單位通報，由於天氣情況惡劣，2025年9月8日原定來往香港西九龍站及湛江西站的高速鐵路列車車次G6048/G6047，更改為來往香港西九龍站至廣州南站。 受影響車次: G6048 (終到站更改為廣州南站) G6047 (始發站更改為廣州南站) 有關車次的資料，請留意12306官方網站(12306.cn)、高速鐵路網頁、手機應用程式或香港西九龍站發放的最新資訊。

2025-09-08T06:25:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following traffic and transport arrangements have been implemented on Cross Bay Bridge at Tseung Kwan O : Motorists heading for Cross Bay Bridge are advised that the fast lanes of the Cross Bay Bridge have been closed due to high wind.
2025-09-08T06:25:00.CONTENT_CN: 因強風，將軍澳跨灣大橋現已實施下列交通及運輸安排: 前往跨灣大橋駕駛人士請注意，因強風，跨灣大橋快線已經封閉。

2025-09-08T16:25:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to improved weather condition, the following traffic and transport arrangements have been implemented on Cross Bay Bridge at Tseung Kwan O : Motorists heading for Cross Bay Bridge are advised that all lanes of the Cross Bay Bridge have been re-opened.
2025-09-08T16:25:00.CONTENT_CN: 因天氣情況改善，將軍澳跨灣大橋現已實施下列交通及運輸安排: 前往跨灣大橋駕駛人士請注意，跨灣大橋全線已經重開。
